target.name: help
target.description: Help explaining how to use this build system.
target.echo:
Welcome to the TYPO3 DocBook Build system! ---------------------------------- You may use the following command format to perform a task: phing <task>
Flags and properties can be given to Phing like this phing -Dsomeflag phing -Dname=value
The available tasks can be listed with phing -l
